random_text_list.content_en: Good day, come and make some origami?
Have you ever heard Kamiya Satoshi?
life is but a span,I choose origami.

random_text_list.content_zh: 只有亲自尝试过,才知道自己真的不行.
random_text_list.content_en: Only if you have tried, you would know that you can't reach the point.

random_text_list.content_zh: 有什么建议或者意见,请联系 mephistogao@hotmail.com
random_text_list.content_en: Please mail me if you don't have boyfriend~ mephistogao@hotmail.com
